reviews.name: Aipeng teoh
reviews.text: I highly recommend Dr. Lee Yi Rou from Le tooth if you need to see a dentist. I am extremely happy with my root canal treatment done by Dr Lee. Dr Lee is very knowledgeable in his field. He explained in detail the root problem of my tooth. After his treatment, I felt very good about my teeth and did not feel any discomfort at all. Dr Lee and his staffs are indeed very professional, caring and gentle.  Thank you Dr Lee and all the staff of Le Tooth.

reviews.name: Sandra Warman
reviews.text: It's better to make an appointment before walking in. The receptionist and the assistant in charge are very helpful. The dentist is patient and takes the time to explain every step of the procedure. The cost is reasonable for the quality of service provided. Highly recommend this clinic!

reviews.name: siti fatimah az-zahraa
reviews.text:
‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è Gentle, compassionate, and truly dedicated dental care

Dr. Leong gave outstanding treatment to my mother with deep care and professionalism. She explained the procedure clearly, ensured my mother‚Äôs comfort, and performed a painless tooth extraction that exceeded our expectations.

What truly touched us was the follow-up from the clinic the next day initiated by Dr. Leong herself to check on my mother‚Äôs recovery. They also offered thoughtful aftercare advice, which showed their genuine concern beyond the clinic walls.

The clinic staffs were friendly, warm, and incredibly helpful throughout. It was a reassuring experience from start to finish.

Highly recommended for anyone seeking respectful, gentle, and patient-focused dental care.
